channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SD

item.title: Report X-2023111223
item.description:
Report X-2023111223

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-13T18:12:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: RAPID CITY
  • State: SD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023111223: SequenceEvent: Package was determined to be leaking in the unload. Package was placed in a tote to contain spill. DescribePack: Loose cap DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a tote to contain spill. X-2023111224: SequenceEvent: Package was determined to be leaking in the unload. Package was placed in a tote to contain spill. DescribePack: Loose Caps DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a tote to contain spill.
